name: WaterTankMonitorforM6-ElMacizoResidence
0:
”Alexa, ask m. six how much water do I have”
”Alexa, ask m. six to get water level”
”Alexa, ask m. six how is my tank”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. six
des:
This skill will enable you to get current water tank level for El Macizo Residence in Escampadero. This information is publicly available to anyone and is currently provided by the TankMon device already installed and configured on the residential buildings.
The skill is compatible with TankMon water level monitoring system.
TankMon uses ultrasonic distance sensor and a small Raspbery Pi computer to perform periodic measures of the tank level, stores information on a database and allow viewing this info on the system LCD screen or through the provided web portal on the Intenet. Now, you can access it from Alexa as well!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
